ygData.subject: Re: Is there anyone out there still on this list? No bugs here.
ygData.msgSnippet: I ll tell you of three skills I wish I had worked on, the magic skills used in summon hammer and ward undead (forget exact names), and my 1 handed blunt skill.
ygData.messageBody:
I'll tell you of three skills I wish I had worked on, the magic skills used
in summon hammer and ward undead (forget exact names), and my 1 handed blunt
skill. Once you get to level 15, 1 handed blunt will be needed to use your
summoned hammer.

>From: Gary Long <glong@...>
>Reply-To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
>To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Is there anyone out there still on this list? No
>bugs here.
>Date: Tue, 25 May 1999 09:02:30 -0700
>
>From: Gary Long <glong@...>
>
>No gating or binding for us holy warriors - walk or run everywhere! Thank
>goodness for bards and their running song, or Shamen, Druids, and Rangers
>for
>the Spirit of the Wolf spell!
>
>By the way, I have two questions for the group:
>1. I'm very close to 10th level - what is the next skill gained after 9th?
>2. I'm currently using a Minotaur axe - what have you found to be the next
>logical weapon upgrade?
>
>Best to you all,
>Kaladin the Paladin from Kaladim (who is *still* mad at the random name
>generator, grrr..)
>
>"Daniel C. Daugherty" wrote:
>
> > Its quiet here....
> >
> > I have a high level Magician and just recently started a Paladin. I
>have to
> > say... I really like him.. but hate not being able to gate. Do you all
> > just walk the land? Selling and buying from Innkeepers? Just going back
>to
>
